summary:
I am a Project Manager with a background in art history. I love everything that has to do with culture: art, fashion, design, music and architecture. I have worked with different museums and I have been in contact with galleries and artists from all over the world.
My other passion is project and event management. Seeing a symposium, website or art exhibition come together and beeing part of it from concept to delivery is a great experience every time.
My goal is working for an international operating company or institution with a strong creative connection where I can combine my passion for project management and culture.

certifications.name: Master of Arts in History of Art

projects.title: Synchronic Spaces
projects.description:
Substantive Principles Program 2010

In 2010 the Kunstenaarsinitiatief Paraplufabriek will investigate the boundaries  of her actions. She will partially leave her home base in the Paraplufabriek by entering all kinds of different spaces: spaces who offer new and different opportunities for disclosure and who will enrich her identity as an art institution. 

By not only operating from her existing space, but by using other forms of territory, the Kunstenaarsinitiatief Paraplufabriek can exist in many different, fluctuating shapes.The artists collective will be in 2010 simultaneously and sometimes temporary only a poster, an essay, a medium, an exhibition, a spoken word or just a thought.   

By ignoring hierarchy in all her activities – a organised group exhibition forms a theoretical and parallel space to a published essay – the Kunstenaarsinitiatief Paraplufabriek will profile herself to the outside world by constant dynamics so she can obtain a certain position as an art institution.
Every space functions as a division and a stroke of an idea and also as a place where it can manifest itself.  By numbering every activity chronological, a database or a sort of archive will arise of every kind of space the Kunstenaarsinitiatief Paraplufabriek has entered and made her own.   

How do works of art relate to space, to specific properties of the space, to durability, to visibility or to the work of others? Every obstacle that we encounter we want to turn in a useable context and base for an exhibition.  

The starting point here is the exploration of the boundaries of an artists collective, of being a curator or an artist, of the making of exhibitions, of the public, the PR, the possible spaces.
The final goal is for us, the curators to engage in an intensive and experimental dialogue with the artists, where both parties can obtain new insights in their work and which will result into innovative, complex and self reflecting forms of making exhibitions.

contributors.headline: Beeldend kunstenaar en docent bij ArtEZ dbkv Arnhem.

projects.title: Exhibition Gist/Rising Project Space Brummen
projects.description:
A fantastic collaboration with the artists Uwe Poth, Seet van Hout, David Powell and Daniel Schlier to develop a concept for the exhibition. 
I also wrote the text for the publication.

projects.title: Heartland
projects.description: A big international exhibition at the van Abbemuseum in Eindhoven with collaborations from artists, museums and galleries from the United States.

profile_positions.description: As per February 1st 2023 Cerner Netherlands is part of Oracle Health. This means that as a Project Coordinator for Oracle Health I am still working on similar projects as for Cerner and fulfilling a similar role. I am part of the Engagement Management team working on multiple projects for different international clients. This means keeping track of all the different components of the projects and provide critical project management analysis to ensure execution is on time, under budget, and within the planned scope. I am responsible for the project administration, hours planning, financial reporting and I support internal and client events. I also work with my PC Team on improving processes and training new associates.
profile_positions.title: Project Coordinator Oracle Health

profile_positions.description:
Cerner is the leading U.S. supplier of healthcare information technology solutions that optimize clinical and financial outcomes. Around the world, health organizations ranging from single-doctor practices to entire countries turn to Cerner for powerful yet intuitive solutions.
As an Engagement Planner for the European Consulting Practice I am part of the Engagement Management team working on multiple projects for different clients. This means keeping track of all the different components of the projects and provide critical project management analysis to ensure execution is on time, under budget, and within the planned scope. I am responsible for managing the budget, support client events, improve processes and apply the Cerner bespoke methodologies: Consulting Framework and MethodM.
profile_positions.title: Engagement Planner/Project Coordinator European Consulting Practice

profile_positions.description: As a Project Manager Events for the Customer Experience team I supported all projects around the big events for Teva Specialty Medicines Europe. This would vary from meetings and congresses to digital projects. I worked very closely with all Specialty Medicines teams and different vendors, like hotels, venues, logistics and AV companies, congress organizers and graphic designers. For all projects I made extensive overviews, keep track of budgets and contracts and any other occasional administration. Most events were organized in big European cities which required a lot of international travel.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager Events Customer Experience

profile_positions.description: Excerpta Medica is a medical communications agency, serving the global pharmaceutical industry with medical strategy consultancy and innovative medical communications programs. I was part of one of the teams of the Integrated Medical Communications department and was the lead on various projects for different pharmaceutical companies. I started as a Coordinator but was promoted within 1 year to Program Manager. My main tasks were to make budgets and proposals, keep contact and nourish a good relationship with our clients and other parties involved in a project. The projects I worked on vary from internal meetings and symposia during medical congresses to websites and apps.
profile_positions.title: Program Manager

profile_positions.description: As a Program Coordinator for the Integrated Medical Communications department I provided operational support to client teams and project teams. This included maintaining financial overviews of accounts for internal and external purposes, faculty and logistics management and on-site support. I was working on different projects in Europe and the U.S. - symposia, advisory boards, satellites and other events.
profile_positions.title: Program Coordinator

profile_positions.description: At Congress Consultants I was part of the Registrations team and I helped with the organization before and during the Annual EAU  Congress of Urology in Milan and Stockholm. An avarage of 10.000 delegates from all over the world attend this congress every year. As part of the Registrations team I was in contact with Pharma companies, travel and logistics companies and healthcare professionals. I was responsible for the correct administrative and financial handling of individual registrations and group registrations. Sometimes I provided support for visa application to delegates from different countries.
profile_positions.title: Congress Support Officer

profile_positions.description:
For CCV I did administrative work, solved malfunctions of devices and wrote content  for the CCV database. On a regular base I was involved in different small specialized projects, like handling of complaints, implementation and testing of new technical components and research om difficult malfunctions.
I also provided on some occasions the technical support for new employees.
profile_positions.title: Support Officer Customer Service

profile_positions.description: Together with  two artists I have provided a one year exhibition program named Synchronic Spaces. We developed a concept and provided a fitting PR-plan and an educational program. We wrote several grant applications for institutions like the Mondriaanstichting. Some of the exhibitions were also linked to other events like the Kunstvlaai and the Kunstnacht. The whole project came together in a beautiful publication for which we did the writing and editing ourselves.
profile_positions.title: Curator/Project Coordinator

profile_positions.description: In the Van Abbemuseum I was an all-round assistant for the exhibition HEARTLAND. I had various tasks: organize meetings, research, editorial work for the magazine and the exhibition booklet and assist the artists and the curator with the construction of the exhibition.
profile_positions.title: Assistant Curator

profile_positions.description: As an intern I have assisted all departments of the museum. I have done research, wrote the bibliography for a few catalogues, assisted the artists and the curator with the construction of the exhibitions and gave tours in the museum.
profile_positions.title: Internship
